item.title: Hope - Journal
item.description: This is accompanied with Hope This is to maintain a daily journal of the efforts. This is to be seen from bottom to top. To explain the jargons: cw: current weight gw: goal weight Ok, lets start. February 24, 2021 cw: 75.60 pulls: 10 I went on a walk, while walking I realized even though Garmin shows 87 kms covered in last 4 weeks, a couple of days were from January so I probably need to walk a bit more to cross a 100.
